<h3 id="X34862">X(34862)&nbsp;=&nbsp; MIDPOINT OF X(3) AND X(84) </h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(2*a^6-(b+c)*a^5-(5*b^2-8*b*c+5*c^2)*a^4+2*(b^3+c^3)*a^3+2*(2*b^2+b*c+2*c^2)*(b-c)^2*a^2-(b^4-c^4)*(b-c)*a-(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c)^2) : :
<b><br>
X(34862) = 3*X(2)+X(12246), 3*X(3)-X(1490), 3*X(3)+X(12684), 3*X(84)+X(1490), 3*X(84)-X(12684), 3*X(165)+X(10864), X(355)-3*X(14647), 3*X(376)+X(9799), 5*X(631)-X(6223), X(962)+3*X(14646), 4*X(6705)-X(22792)
</b>
<p>
See Antreas Hatzipolakis and César Lozada, <a href="https://groups.io/g/euclid/message/195"><b>Euclid 195 </b></a>.
</p>
<p>
X(34862) lies on these lines: {1, 24645}, {2, 6259}, {3, 9}, {4, 5435}, {5, 6692}, {8, 17613}, {20, 3419}, {21, 10167}, {24, 12136}, {30, 6245}, {35, 12680}, {36, 12688}, {40, 4915}, {55, 10085}, {56, {12668, 26451}, {12676, 26492}, {12677, 26487}, {12686, 16203}, {12687, 16202}, {13243, 34772}, {13253, 33176}, {13257, 27385}, {13730, 26927}, {15251, 24171}, {15803, 19541}, {16408, 21164}, {17100, 17661}, {17558, 21151}, {21669, 26877}, {22758, 31788}, {23961, 31828}, {26332, 31776}, {31937, 32612}, {32198, 32537}
</p>
<p>
X(34862) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3, 84}, {20, 5787}, {1158, 12114}, {1490, 12684}, {2950, 12773}, {5887, 17649}, {6259, 12246}, {12650, 12702} <br>
X(34862) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (5, 6705), (1385, 5450), (6256, 9956), (6260, 140), (6261, 13624), (11500, 31663), (18480, 12616), (22792, 5) <br>
X(34862) = complement of X(6259) <br>
X(34862) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 12246, 6259), (3, 5779, 936), (3, 7171, 31805), (3, 7330, 5044), (3, 12684, 1490), (3, 31445, 31658), (56, 1709, 9856), (84, 1490, 12684), (104, 12672, 24928), (499, 12679, 1538), (1071, 6906, 24929), (6914, 13369, 1385), (9841, 31424, 3) <br>
</p>
